Welcome to Spynl’s documentation!¶

Spynl is a Python web framework built on top of Pyramid.

It comes with some opinionated included batteries for modern web development like HTML emails, translations and building to Docker and Jenkins.

Quickly get to writing your actual features in a Spynl plugin and get out there.

TODO: simple usage?

  • venv
  • pip install spynl
  • spynl serve
  • curl localhost:6543/about

write simple Plugin - setup.py, plugger.py
